body: Holy moly  this is great, cant wait to see next part
I like this author. So glad he's being translated.

@Herzer It is not really offended by it but it is alway sad to see the credit page removed. ^^ And is it because we are a bit confused why there are complaints by some people. The resolution we use is picked to make it fit on all screens because some sites don't re size it. I get how a bigger resolution can make it look better but I would find it great if you can explain it in a bit more detail to me. True but if you contacted I would have been happy to provide you with the PSD to make your life simpler. But why change the font to only one font? It is a bit big in my opinion.  But anyway if you ever want to join a team would like the have you we really need more typesetters XD Just ask next time and if you edit it also credit the cleaner.

@Shameless scans

Apologies if you got offended, but your release is way too small in resolution. 
It was hard for me to enjoy reading it, so I went and used shanko's higher res version.

And I did the edit from scratch. I didn't have the script nor the PSDs from your version nor will I use the same font.
As for the errors, that's my mistake.

@Herzer if you ever see this I just want to ask why? This is not a re-edit it is just all the same fonts you changed page 7 with the bubble so the art does not cover it and don't know why... Also on some pages, you skipped a font to change and on page 27 you messed up a bubble. Also removing the credit page is low because you only credited to Translator but not the cleaner... But I still want to thank you for the interested in the manga.
